name: Project Doom (PT Games)
description:
Project Doom is a game created by PT Games

in this awesome Battle Royale you can

Play With Friends

Find New Weapons

And get a PT Pass For Only $5.

NOTE: Emotes Are Only Available if you have the PT Pass

Default Controls:

Alt+1 = Emote 1

Alt+2 = Emote 2

Alt+3 = Emote 3

Alt+4 = Emote 4

Alt+5 = Emote 5

Reload: R

Build: Q

Shoot: LMB

Target: RMB

Switch Weapons: 1,2,3,4

F11= Fullscreen

Coded In: Unreal Engine 4.26
